//turbo_room,82,85,6	shop	Brewing Potion	850,503:100,504:500,505:1000,506:2000

//The Warper to Mall

prontera.gat,147,170,6	script	Mall Warper	757,{
	shop:	warp "6@tower.gat" ,155,139;
OnInit:

waitingroom "DevainneRO MaLL",0;
end;
}	

//The Warper to Mall

new_1-1,54,115,5	script	Prontera Warper	757,{
	shop:	warp "prontera" ,155,176;
OnInit:

waitingroom "Welcome To Devainne RO",0;
end;
}

//The Exit to Prontera

6@tower.gat,149,141,5	script	Exit	757,{
	warp "prontera.gat" ,155,176;
OnInit:

waitingroom "DevainneRO MaLL Exit",0;
end;
}
